content:
A number of issues have been raised on the mCODE IG STU 1 version. The project team have begun to address them and will be scheduling a block vote in the CIC work group in the near future. If there are any issues you would like to discuss individually, please let me know and I will pull them from the block.

Here is a query that will produce the same list as the enclosed in JIRA:

project="FHIR" AND Specification = "US Minimal Common Oncology Data Elements (mCODE) (FHIR) [FHIR-us-mcode]" and "Raised in Version" = 1.0.0 and type = "Change Request" and Grouping = Block-Vote-1

Thank you! mCODE-Block-Vote-1-proposed-2020-11-09.xlsx
